content: I've been thinking about how we want to manage FMM levels for extensions this round. What I'd like to propose is that we only worry about FMM levels for extensions that can appear on "normative" artifacts and that we leave the rest as FMM 0/draft. Is that reasonable?
At that point, changes to those extensions will need to start being treated as substantive
(@Anne Wizauer can we add this to Wednesday's agenda?)
For review on our next (or an upcoming) call: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Balloting_and_Publishing_FHIR_content
